data.title: Subway sandwich in a hurry
data.text: You always know what you are going to get when you go to a Subway.  Their food is consistent, it tastes the same from one Subway to the other.  We like their sandwiches, but they are basic compared to a lot of the other  sandwich shops around now.  Our college grandson will always pick Subway when we ask him where he wants to go for a sandwich, and he is never disappointed in what he gets.
